proposals.title: Forecast Rice Exports to Bangladesh
proposals.problem_statement: Predict future rice export quantities and values to Bangladesh using historical data. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values using mean or median of the respective column.

proposals.validation_plan: Split the data into training and test sets based on time. Evaluate using RMSE and MAE.
quality_checks: Verify that the target column has sufficient data points.
Check for any duplicates or inconsistencies in the data.

proposals.title: Forecast Rice Export Values to Bangladesh
proposals.problem_statement: Predict future rice export values to Bangladesh using historical data. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values using mean or median of the respective column.

proposals.validation_plan: Split the data into training and test sets based on time. Evaluate using RMSE and MAE.
quality_checks: Verify that the target column has sufficient data points.
Check for any duplicates or inconsistencies in the data.

proposals.title: Analyze Trends in Rice Exports to Bangladesh
proposals.problem_statement: Analyze trends in rice exports to Bangladesh over the years. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values using mean or median of the respective column.

proposals.validation_plan: Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends and patterns.
quality_checks: Ensure that the data is clean and consistent.
Check for any outliers or anomalies in the data.
